name: Nepy's Adventure
description:
Pricncess Sarracenia is imprisoned on top of the tower! Help Nepy complete puzzles and rescue her! 

In order to grow frog or transform it into a leaf you need to complete 3 different puzzels that are placed on the platofrms around the main island. After completing the 1st one you can grow and transform the Small Frog. 2nd puzzle let's you grow into big frog and transform the middle one. The big section will allow you to transform the big frog into a leaf. 

A cozy puzzle/platformer made for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1

Programming: Zaabinski

Art: Kavartu and BAD_DAD

Music: Trevor Dodd
